name: 2D Platformer (chef nico)
description:
2D Platformer Proposed Modifications:

1) I want to add a level where the player has to go through a set of moving platforms with objects to avoid to reach a boss in the next level that takes multiple hits and extra changes to kill.

2) I want to change all of the skins of the game to be more as a war/alternate style  (so not centered in space as the original) along with custom sound effects and music tracks.

3) I want to add different powerups such as a kill all on screen or insta-kill along with new enemies with different behaviors along with the boss as said in the first modifications and to modify the Main menu and pause settings with a minimap as well.

Created by Nicolas Georgescu
